title: Nation K cause of decreased nominal interest rates

content.question: Assume the banking system in Nation K has limited reserves. Which of the following would most likely lead to a decrease in nominal interest rates in Nation K?

choices.label: The central bank in Nation K buys government securities.
The central bank in Nation K increases the required reserve ratio.
The government of Nation K decreases income taxes.
The government of Nation K increases unemployment benefits.
The government of Nation K increases spending.

content.answer: The central bank in Nation K buys government securities.

skill.text: Skill 2.A: Using economic concepts, principles, or models, explain how a specific economic outcome occurs, or what action should be taken in order to achieve a specific economic outcome.
